extendedInfo.description: Playing with lighting effects and coloring effects within the photo, we created a city of wacky colors. We then made it into 3D and added special lighting. This is a rotating 3D cube live Wallpaper and it will dazzle you on your phone. Features include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.
